sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import './QueryCard.css' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class QueryCard extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { return ( <> Consulta {thisprops.subject}: {this.props.state} {props.date} {props.description} {/* */} this.handleModal(false)}> this.handleModal(false)} /> this.handletoast(false)} show={this.state.toast.show} delay={3000} > Mensaje {this.state.toast.text} ) } } export default QueryCard
